comments:
I am doing a lot of xml file editing for a web app.  After using eclipse for about 30 minutes I start to get 
strange things happening in the editor.  For instance:
typing but no text appearing until i enter.
click on tab but tab doesn't appear until i enter or minimize/maximize eclipse
it seems like a refresh issue but then when i look at my console i see the following:
